name: TELPort: High-Speed Communication Protocol Using Sound Waves and Transmission/Reception Application via Speaker and Microphone
description: This protocol converts various data into composite waves of multiple frequencies and amplitudes, providing communication that utilizes both space and time. It enables the rapid and accurate transfer of files and information that are difficult to convey verbally. Additionally, by implementing it as a smartphone application, it can be easily introduced for various purposes without the need for special equipment or significant costs.
